greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle with row sums counting directed animals.
comment: Row sums are A005773(n+1). Product of A007318 and A122899 is A103371.
formula: T(n,k) = C(n,k)*C(k+1,n-k). The columns of this triangle (ignoring leading zeros) give the rows of A123160. - _Peter Bala_, Jan 24 2008
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Sep 18 2006
